title: FTC Sues to Block Microsoft's Acquisition of Activision
description: The U.S. regulator sued Microsoft to prevent its planned $75 billion deal for Activision Blizzard, taking one of its biggest shots under the Biden administration at halting a merger of technology giants.

title: Amazon Launches TikTok-Style Feed in Push to Accelerate Social Shopping
description: The tech company joins its U.S. peers in capitalizing on the popularity of the short-video format.

title: Can You Tell a Real Tweet From One Written By an AI Chatbot?
description: Take the quiz to see how much artificial intelligence resembles the real thing

title: Tesla Sales of Chinese-Made Cars Hit Record, as Nation's Auto Market Shrinks
description: China’s overall November car sales slump is likened to that of 2008 financial crisis.

title: Letter From Top Apple Supplier Foxconn Prodded China to Ease Zero-Covid Rules
description: Foxconn Technology Group founder Terry Gou warned that the government’s strict policies would threaten its position in global supply chains.

title: Tired of Spotify's Algorithm? These 5 Apps Help You Discover Music in New Ways
description: Music streaming services like HotDrop, which has an interface like Tinder, and Amp, where you might catch Nicki Minaj hosting a radio show, will expose you to a wide range of unexpected tunes

title: Judge to Hear FTC's Bid to Block Meta Deal
description: Facebook’s parent company faces an antitrust fight over its proposed purchase of startup Within Unlimited.

title: Google Combines Maps and Waze Teams in Restructuring Move
description: Google plans to combine the team working on the mapping service Waze with the group overseeing the company’s Maps product, as the search giant faces pressure to streamline operations and cut costs.
